CompareToOption.current: This parameter is not needed (pass null).CompareToOption.label: This parameter is the label that was applied to the object at objectPathLeft.CompareToOption.lastget: This parameter is not needed (pass null).CompareToOption.local: This parameter is the path to the local folder or file.CompareToOption.repository: This parameter is the path to the repository file or folder. member.name: T:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.SourceGearVault.vaultgetlabeltolocationoutsideworkingfolder
member.summary: Get the version of a Vault object which has the provided label. This method will download the Vault objects into a non working folder. If you use this method to download objects, you will not be able to check in from the that folder on disk. If you will need to check in from this location, use ProcessCommandGetLabelToTempWorkingFolder instead.

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.SourceGearVault.vaultgetlabeltolocationoutsideworkingfolder.getOptions
member.summary: The options that will control how the get is performed. This attribute is optional.

member.summary: The location on disk where the downloaded files will be placed. You will not be able to check in from this location. This attribute is required.

member.name: T:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.SourceGearVault.VaultGetOptions
member.summary: This class encapsulates all of the options that can be passed into a simple get request. When a new GetOptions is constructed, it is prefilled with the user's current options.

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.SourceGearVault.VaultGetOptions.Merge
member.summary:
Controls how and if files that have been modified locally are replaced with versions from the repository. Possible values are: "OverwriteWorkingCopy", "MergeLater", "AttemptAutomaticMerge", and "Unspecified".
This attribute is optional. The default value is "AttemptAutomaticMerge".

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.SourceGearVault.VaultGetOptions.Recursive
member.summary:
Controls if folders are recursively fetched.
This attribute is optional. The default value is true.

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.SourceGearVault.VaultGetOptions.MakeWritable
member.summary:
Controls if files are marked as writable when fetched. Possible values are: "MakeNonMergableFilesReadOnly", "MakeAllFilesReadOnly", and "MakeAllFilesWritable".
This attribute is optional. The default value is "MakeNonMergableFilesReadOnly".

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.SourceGearVault.VaultGetOptions.SetFileTime
member.summary:
Controls the date placed in the file's Last Modified attribute. Possible values are: "Current", "Modification", and "CheckIn".
This attribute is optional. The default value is "Current".

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.SourceGearVault.VaultGetOptions.PerformDeletions
member.summary:
Controls if files which are deleted, moved or renamed in the repository are deleted, moved or renamed on disk when the get is completed. This option is ignored for get operations to locations outside of working folders. Possible values are: "RemoveWorkingCopy", "DoNotRemoveWorkingCopy", and "RemoveWorkingCopyIfUnmodified".
This attribute is optional. The default value is "RemoveWorkingCopyIfUnmodified".

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.SourceGearVault.VaultGetOptions.OverrideEOL
member.summary:
Mergable files will be converted to the given line-ending type when fetched. Available types are: "None", "Native", "CR", "LF", or "CRLF". "none" means "don't override".
This attribute is optional. The default value is "None".

member.name: T:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.SourceGearVault.vaultgettolocationoutsideworkingfolder

member.summary: Recursively act on folders. This attribute is optional. The default value is false.

member.summary: Specify the sort ordering of the history results. Possible values are: "asc" and "desc". This attribute is optional. The default value is "desc".

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.SourceGearVault.vaulthistory.excludedUsers
member.summary: A comma-separated list of users to filter out of the history request. For example, "admin,builduser,bob". Pass null to return history items for all users. This attribute is optional. The default value is null.

member.name: P:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.SourceGearVault.vaulthistory.excludedActions
member.summary: A comma-separated list of actions to filter out of the history request. To exclude all actions, pass "add,branch,checkin,create,delete,label,move,obliterate,pin,propertychange,rename,rollback,share,snapshot,undelete". Pass null to return history for all actions. This attribute is optional. The default value is null.

member.summary: The label that will be used as the ending point for the history query. Pass null to include all history. This attribute is optional. The default value is null.

member.name: T:NAnt.Contrib.Tasks.SourceGearVault.vaultobliterate
member.summary: Obliterate an object which has been deleted. This will throw an Exception if there are multiple deleted objects at the specified path. Obliterate is will permanently remove a deleted folder or file (and all its history) from the repository. You must be logged in as a administrator user to use this command. This command should not be used lightly, as there is no way to undo it.
